H0.text: In which city were the 2009 World Athletic Championships held. Berlin

H1.text: In which city were the 2009 World Athletic Championships held. London

H2.text: In which city were the 2009 World Athletic Championships held. Paris

H3.text: In which city were the 2009 World Athletic Championships held. DEBER

A4.text: The 12th IAAF World Championships in Athletics (German: Leichtathletik-Weltmeisterschaften 2009) were held in Berlin, Germany from 15 to 23 August 2009.

A5.text: The majority of events took place in the Olympiastadion, while the marathon and racewalking events started and finished at the Brandenburg Gate.
